extensionDescription.message: Un semplice client per Nextcloud Passwords

browserActionTitle.description: Title of the button in the browser bar

No logins found.description: Shown when the related page did not find any results

No matches.description: Shown when the search did not find any results

Type to search.description: Shown when the search query is empty

Password request failed.description: Notification title when the password request fails

Failed to get password list.message: Non è stato possibile recuperare l' elenco password. Errore: $ERROR$
Failed to get password list.description: Notification text when the password request fails

New login detected.description: Notification title when a new login is detected

Click to save password.message: Clicca qui per salvare la password per "$USER$"
Click to save password.description: Notification text when a new login is detected

Password saved.description: Notification title when a password was saved

Password stored sucessfully.message: La password è stata memorizzata con successo
Password stored sucessfully.description: Notification text when a password was saved

Save password failed.description: Notification title when saving a password failed

Unable to save password.message: Non è stato possibile salvare la password
Unable to save password.description: Notification text when saving a password failed

Updated login detected.description: Notification title when an updated login is detected

Click to update password.message: Clicca qui per aggiornare la password per "$USER$"
Click to update password.description: Notification text when an updated login is detected

Password updated.description: Notification title when a password was updated

Password updated sucessfully.message: La password è stata aggiornata con successo
Password updated sucessfully.description: Notification text when a password was updated

Update password failed.description: Notification title when updating a password failed

Unable to update password.message: La password non può essere aggiornata
Unable to update password.description: Notification text when updating a password failed
